inputs.name: Output file

inputs.name: File list

inputs.name: Paired sum

inputs.name: Paired average

inputs.name: Paired difference

inputs.name: Paired difference norm1

inputs.name: Paired difference norm2

inputs.description: Normalize frames by mean of all time points.
inputs.name: Normalize mean

inputs.description: Normalize frames by first time point (TP1).
inputs.name: Normalize TP1

inputs.description: Multiply by matrix from ASCII file.
inputs.name: Matrix file

inputs.description: Weight each frame by values in ASCII file (one value per frame).
inputs.name: Frame weight file

inputs.name: Normalized weighting

inputs.description: Create matrix to average Ng groups, Nper=Ntot/Ng.
inputs.name: Group mean

inputs.description: Average frames from non-zero voxels.
inputs.name: Combine frames

inputs.description: Write output in the same datatype as input (default is Float format).
inputs.name: Keep datatype

inputs.name: Take absolute value

inputs.description: Set input negatives to 0.
inputs.name: Set negatives to zero

inputs.name: Set positives to zero

inputs.description: Compute mean of concatenated volumes.
inputs.name: Mean

inputs.description: Compute median of concatenated volumes.
inputs.name: Median

inputs.description: Compute mean divided by number of frames.
inputs.name: Mean divided by N

inputs.description: Compute sum of concatenated volumes.
inputs.name: Sum

inputs.name: Variance

inputs.name: Standard deviation

inputs.description: Compute maximum of concatenated volumes.
inputs.name: Maximum

inputs.description: Compute index of maximum of concatenated volumes.
inputs.name: Maximum index

inputs.description: Set max index to 0 where all frames are 0.
inputs.name: Max index prune

inputs.description: Add value to non-zero max indices.
inputs.name: Max index add value

inputs.description: Compute minimum of concatenated volumes.
inputs.name: Minimum

inputs.description: Replicate N times over frames.
inputs.name: Replicate frames

inputs.description: Normalize time series at each voxel.
inputs.name: Functional normalization

inputs.name: Conjunction

inputs.description: Most frequent value at each voxel and fraction of occurrences.
inputs.name: Voting mechanism

inputs.description: Sort each voxel by ascending frame value.
inputs.name: Sort voxel values

inputs.description: Compute temporal AR1 with degree of freedom adjustment.
inputs.name: Temporal AR1

inputs.description: Set voxel value to 0 unless all frames are non-zero.
inputs.name: Prune non-zero values

inputs.description: Compute and output principal component analysis (PCA).
inputs.name: Principal component analysis

inputs.description: Mask used to select voxels for PCA (mask > 0.5).
inputs.name: PCA mask

inputs.description: Compute spatial covariance matrix.
inputs.name: Spatial covariance matrix

inputs.name: Z concatenation

inputs.name: Max Bonferroni correction

inputs.name: Multiply value

inputs.name: Add value
